resources.string: Find out how far the bus is from you
Search your bus number to start shift
There was an Error, Please Try Again.
\nFind timetable information that is closes to you, click on the bus stop and the departure times will display\n
\nGet real-time data on how far your bus is.

1. On 'My Shift' tab, please enter the bus number your shift is designated for.

 2. Then select the route direction you are taking.
 NOTE: If you change route direction, please end your shift and start a new one with the correct direction.

 3. You will be directed to the map interface, your location will be tracked during your shift for easy use.

 4. YOUR ROLE: Once you are stationary at a bus stop, please press the marker corresponding to the bus stop you are at. Only need to press once. A notification will prompt a successful act.

 5. Once finished, or changing route direction, you may 'end-shift'.

 6. Drive safely.

 NOTE: The number value that's updated when a marker is click represents the difference between arrival and scheduled time, shown as minutes:seconds.
 Negative value = earlier then scheduled.
 Positive value = later then scheduled.
 Green color = on-time.
 Red color = not on-time.

1. On 'Analysis' tab, click on the bus that you wish to analysis.

 2. Both Line and Pie Graphs will appear representing collated data.
 NOTE: Clicking on a data point will activate an 'EXAMINE' button, to further analyse the data point.
Linear Chart Representing Analytical Bus Data
Pie Chart Representing On-Time Bus Data (%)
Are you sure you want to delete this data point?
Deleting the datapoint will remove it entirely, cannot be undone.
